title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: I had a dream where I saw bitcoin pumping non stop, it was global news that everybody was so excited and repositioning to invest and trades. I guess this is a good sign that it will do more than what I saw. Lucky enough is only those who are buying at deepening price that will enjoy the good news when it finally starts to pump. From the graph or charts this downtime normal takes six months plus because unfriendly attitude of government and individuals on bitcoin but let's observe towards November and see what will come of the price. Don't get shock when its start pumping non stop for a year interval, I guess you will be happy or don't have any capital like again. Invest and wait but invest wisely. Hope for better days ahead

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: If your dream come true, i believe it will be a good one to those that put all their capital to buy BTC when the price was $18k last year because, they believed that the price will surely pump very well this year like what you saw in your dream concerning BTC pumping non stop. I knew it before that this year will be more favourable than last year that made many people to hold their coins not to experience  losses in their trading than to keep watching till the bear market will leave before they can supply to the market to make incomes.Many investors are very ready to feel bull season so that they will start selling their coins to earn well from their long term investments and to look for another opportunity to buy and hold again for another bright future.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: If there is something that you should have learned from previous experiences, it is that you build your investments on the worst scenario, not the best. Living in a dream that the price will continue to rise is what makes you greedy, and then you will miss the opportunity to buy bitcoin.Just be greedy when others are panicking, when negative news is coming from every direction and everyone wants to sell on the first rally.As for waiting to reach ATH, it is betting on a novice driver in Formula 2 races.

comments.author: fadhilz123
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on March 15, 2023, 03:20:52 PMI had a dream where I saw bitcoin pumping non stop, it was global news that everybody was so excited and repositioning to invest and trades. I guess this is a good sign that it will do more than what I saw. Lucky enough is only those who are buying at deepening price that will enjoy the good news when it finally starts to pump. From the graph or charts this downtime normal takes six months plus because unfriendly attitude of government and individuals on bitcoin but let's observe towards November and see what will come of the price. Observing after buying, it's much nicer I think. But if those who haven't bought yet are still observing until the end of the year, I don't think that's a very good option because they won't get anything from that observation either. So make your beautiful dream come true by continuing to buy Bitcoin when the price falls or before the price becomes more expensive because if you just say an illusion, you will not feel any results from it.QuoteDon't get shock when its start pumping non stop for a year interval, I guess you will be happy or don't have any capital like again. Invest and wait but invest wisely. Hope for better days aheadI will never be surprised if it is Bitcoin that is being pumped, because as many people know that the pump on Bitcoin is a very normal thing because it happens based on demand and supply and also because the enthusiasts are increasing so that the pump is always more it's easy to happen although the correction also doesn't just disappear when there is bad news for the crypto space.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: It could happen sometime soon after the recovery period sets in and more support comes to the crypto. It will make many people look like they don't believe in the power of bitcoin and start considering using bitcoin as their choice besides continuing to use fiat.And we can still invest in bitcoin today because the price of bitcoin is also not very high and even though the price got a pump yesterday, it is not a real pump. Bitcoin still has a long way to go and so does its price. So if you try to buy bitcoins now, you will see an increase in the value of your asset later and it will surely surprise you.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on March 15, 2023, 03:20:52 PMI had a dream where I saw bitcoin pumping non stop, it was global news that everybody was so excited and repositioning to invest and trades. I guess this is a good sign that it will do more than what I saw. Lucky enough is only those who are buying at deepening price that will enjoy the good news when it finally starts to pump. From the graph or charts this downtime normal takes six months plus because unfriendly attitude of government and individuals on bitcoin but let's observe towards November and see what will come of the price. Don't get shock when its start pumping non stop for a year interval, I guess you will be happy or don't have any capital like again. Invest and wait but invest wisely. Hope for better days aheadBut in any case, we have seen the pump already, 2 days of huge pump pushing the price above $26k. However, after that, the price seems to subside already, so for now, let's say it's good while it lasted.And hopefully we can maintain that $25k label because that is the biggest resistance so far. Every time we try to break into that price, we can't seems to maintain it. As if there are forces pulling it down.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Well if we did sustain our run to $26k then I would have to believed that we might see a continues pump and maybe up to $30k. But it was very short, price drop to < $25k.But I would rather see this kind of movement, we don't want a fake price increased or manipulation per se. It should be steady flow and the movement has the support of most traders not just whales or manipulators.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: I hope the dream comes true very soon. But as we know, Bitcoins are famous for repeating history, so this year it has been destined for Bitcoins that they will break their all-time high price. Bitcoins also gave us a sign at the beginning of February, when it suddenly rose to a price of 25k usd from 17k usd, and March is also trying really hard to break the resistance and come out of the 25k price range. So let’s hope for the best. Also, kudos to the ones who bought bitcoins under $25,000 and held on to them for a long time. Bitcoins will soon touch the moon.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on March 16, 2023, 12:51:38 PMI hope the dream comes true very soon. But as we know, Bitcoins are famous for repeating history, so this year it has been destined for Bitcoins that they will break their all-time high price. Bitcoins also gave us a sign at the beginning of February, when it suddenly rose to a price of 25k usd from 17k usd, and March is also trying really hard to break the resistance and come out of the 25k price range. So let’s hope for the best. Also, kudos to the ones who bought bitcoins under $25,000 and held on to them for a long time. Bitcoins will soon touch the moon.I guess bitcoin won't be touching the moon anytime soon. I don't think it will be this year. Since you say bitcoin history repeats itself regularly, a new ATH will happen next year after the halving. But that does not rule out that this year could also be a bullish year for bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: There are already bank runs happening which could be the first that we may foresee. Credit Suisse is on the brink of collapse as it was said in the global news today. We may not have to wait til November to see the price going up. When everyone panics because banks not working anymore, they will turn to BTC to keep thier money than depositing them in banks.

comments.author: ilovealtcoins
comments.body: Quote from: fzkto on March 16, 2023, 01:49:29 PMQuote from: Nrcewker on March 16, 2023, 12:51:38 PMI hope the dream comes true very soon. But as we know, Bitcoins are famous for repeating history, so this year it has been destined for Bitcoins that they will break their all-time high price. Bitcoins also gave us a sign at the beginning of February, when it suddenly rose to a price of 25k usd from 17k usd, and March is also trying really hard to break the resistance and come out of the 25k price range. So let’s hope for the best. Also, kudos to the ones who bought bitcoins under $25,000 and held on to them for a long time. Bitcoins will soon touch the moon.I guess bitcoin won't be touching the moon anytime soon. I don't think it will be this year. Since you say bitcoin history repeats itself regularly, a new ATH will happen next year after the halving. But that does not rule out that this year could also be a bullish year for bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.Anything is possible, with bitcoin, nothing is impossible. But I also find it hard to believe that bitcoin will hit the moon this year. Look how bad the world economy is, and it could get worse for the rest of the year. So can't expect a bull run without big money flowing into the market.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on March 15, 2023, 03:20:52 PMDon't get shock when its start pumping non stop for a year interval, I guess you will be happy or don't have any capital like again. Invest and wait but invest wisely. Hope for better days aheadExpecting a non stop pump on a manipulative market is absurd thing to do. You probably get high on the recent FOMO that makes you wet on the dream but Bitcoin won’t pump that much if the economy is in the verge of collapsing. I know that people might speculate that whales will move their fiat to crypto to avoid the impact of financial crisis but the real concern is people still needs to convert Bitcoin to fiat in able to use it to purchase since Bitcoin is not yet a legal tender. I don’t expect a non stop while there’s a lot of uncertainty in the global economy.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: You might have gotten excited about the most recent bitcoin pump that you ended dreaming with a bitcoin pumping to the moon. But indeed, once it happens, it does without previous warnings. When we see bitcoin has already climbed few thousands of dollars or even more, depending the intensity of the pump, therefore investors have to be always prepared for the bitcoin rally, holding most coins as possible, in a safe way.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: Those individuals who make investment in 2022 are very successful but those who do not invest some cash are deprived of benefit because now the market is going towards enhanced value and we are hoping that it will very soon go more and more successful in giving beneficial results.When price decrease then people become upset but actually this decrease in price has great impact on market situations because decrease price can allow users to invest some money while investment during higher cost is not simple.Although we do not know that what will be next step and what will next price but we know that it's fact that after every fall there is a gain. So previous year was falling year now this year is successful and will give users an opportunity that will be full of fruitful outcomes. Price will increase more in this year and will be beneficial for holders of bitcoin.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on March 15, 2023, 03:20:52 PMDon't get shock when its start pumping non stop for a year interval, I guess you will be happy or don't have any capital like again. Invest and wait but invest wisely. Hope for better days aheadOh you mean when bull market comes? Well, you know it's not that how it works because there's always a resistance which means it will stop somehow but will continue depending on the hype/fomo of the market. If there are no buyers you won't be able to see Bitcoin price continuously pumping, right?You should understand how the market works and not just assume that things will works this way magically. There's always a reason on why it's happening despite of what you are thinking/dreaming. Well, apparently it will happen after the halving next year but the real pump will likely going to happen at Q4 next year IMO.

comments.author: BITCOIN4X
comments.body: Quote from: cryptomaniac_xxx on March 16, 2023, 12:38:14 PMWell if we did sustain our run to $26k then I would have to believed that we might see a continues pump and maybe up to $30k. But it was very short, price drop to < $25k.Yes, somehow bitcoin didn't manage to stay above $25K after the pump. I still think a lot of people are still hesitant to hold their bitcoins long term so they are very keen to sell them when small pump occur like the last few days. But strong support at $24K can be expected and continued upside should become a reality.I didn't believe bitcoin would reach $25K in March, but I was wrong. But it may be true that it is still difficult to get bitcoin to stay above $25K today. Investing now is the best option, and once again the long term optimism about bitcoin's potential should have increased.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: If you want to live by dream then you must be kidding, bitcoin price movement or action doesn't obey any law or prophecies even a dream because naturally bitcoin doesn't pump continually without stopping, the only thing I know too well is that it rise for a while maybe after making a new ATH then it would dropped to previous ATH before making a new wave to meet newer price.Always study the market carefully and follow the previous chats to determine your current investment plan.

comments.author: G_Besar
comments.body: Quote from: ilovealtcoins on March 16, 2023, 03:00:03 PMAnything is possible, with bitcoin, nothing is impossible. But I also find it hard to believe that bitcoin will hit the moon this year. Look how bad the world economy is, and it could get worse for the rest of the year. So can't expect a bull run without big money flowing into the market. The world economy is currently not fully improved, but that does not mean that everyone can predict the condition of the world economy at the end of this year now. Because it is possible that before the end of this year the world economy can improve and there will be more people who will enter several markets including the crypto market to make purchases on Bitcoin which of course is already known as an excellent investment asset. I'd be more than happy to see that Bitcoin can get an improvement to go to the moon again even if not in a short time this year, because every price increase definitely takes time even though it doesn't always take a long time to increase in price, but in general it always takes time in every increase.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: Without you dreaming about the price increase in bitcoin or not, there is a belief in people's minds that bitcoin will increase when halving is approaching since its historical performance shows that bitcoin does well in price throughout each halving season compared to the previous one.By the way, a lot of individuals are preparing for the ride by making little investments with money they can afford to lose. By the next year, the price of bitcoin is going to fluctuate greatly.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Because of how much we think of bitcoin at all times, even in our dreams it's never gone. I've dreamt of it as well a lot and that only indicates that we care of its price every time there's a market reaction whether it's a correction or not. But as you've said, that's a good sign. We've crossed $27k just this time and it's about to break $28k any time soon and as we move on the weekend. This is where most of the correction happens but that's to be expected when we just came from a quick pump.
